title: Beautiful...
text:
I like trying to make it take as long as possible to fall. My record so far (2 weeks of use) is that one day I started it up in the morning and it was still going the next morning! I've got one that's been going for 6 hours right now, but it's not going to break the record. The best way to do it seems to be not to use it for a few days between tries, that allows the bubbles to join up into bigger bubbles that work better. And don't bump the table!

Regarding the way it looks, I love it. The colors are so natural, it reminds me of layers of silt deposited at the bottom of the ocean. And the gold sometimes makes defined layers and other times mixes in to turn the white orange. So much variation, this will be worth looking at for a long time to come!
